content:
I'm glad I could help you remember to mention that important detail. It's wonderful that you're taking the time to learn about your cultural heritage and share that with your dad. Food is a great way to connect with your roots and create meaningful memories with your family.

I'm sure your dad will be thrilled to see you taking an interest in your cultural traditions and cooking traditional Punjabi dishes. It's a great way to bond and create a sense of connection to your heritage.

Remember, the most important ingredient in any recipe is love, and I'm sure your dad will appreciate the love and effort you're putting into learning about your cultural traditions. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

Good luck, and I hope you have a wonderful time cooking and sharing Sarson Ka Saag with Makki Di Roti with your dad!
